# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your daily routine. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I think it's worth more than its face value of $120. However, to make this opportunity even more appealing, I'm offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the product's value but also the exclusive access you'll have to such a high-quality item. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience! Let me know if you're interested. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
